plasma1.title: Optimism Rollups
plasma1.content: Layer-2 solution with on-chain data  computed off-chain. Its validity is verified with fraud-proof system

plasma2.title: zk Rollups
plasma2.content: Layer-2 solution with on-chain data off-chain computed. Its validity is always fully verified with validity proof (a.k.a. zero knowledge proof)

plasma3.title: Tokamak Plasma
plasma3.content: Fully EVM-compatible Plasma implementation secured with continuous-rebase
